code: var gameReducer=function gameReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{lang:"English",isAuthenticated:false,playerInfo:null,loginError:null};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var newState=Object.assign({},state);var type=action.type,value=action.value;switch(type){case"setLoginError":newState.loginError=value;return newState;case"setPlayerInfo":newState.playerInfo=value;return newState;case"setLang":newState.lang=value;return newState;case"setIsAuthenticated":newState.isAuthenticated=value;return newState;default:return state;}};export default gameReducer;
